# Methods and Data

We applied Louvain method[@Blondel_Fast_2008]. Modularity Q is defined as follows.

$$ Q=\frac{1}{2 m}\sum_{i,j} (A_{ij} - \frac{k_i k_j}{2 m})\delta(c_i,c_j) $$
